message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe that's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm afraid I can't accept $900000. Considering the product's unique features and my costs, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering it to you for $1100000. This is a fair price, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $900000. I'm willing to go up to $950000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

I understand your willingness to compromise, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but this time, I'll give you a slightly better deal. I'm offering it to you for $1050000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.

I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $800000. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll consider it, but I'm not making any further concessions.
